mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nctmembers (memberId, name, birthdate, nationality, position, mbti, image, regdate) VALUES (NCTMEMBERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{nationality}, #{position}, #{mbti}, #{image}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO nctgroups (groupId, memberRefId, groupName) SELECT NCTGROUPS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, A.* FROM (
SELECT #{group} FROM DUAL ) A
mapper.select: SELECT memberId, name, birthdate, nationality, position, mbti, image, regdate, listagg(groupName, ', ') within group(order by groupName) AS groupName FROM nctmembers JOIN nctgroups ON (nctmembers.memberId = nctgroups.memberRefId) GROUP BY memberId, name, birthdate, nationality, position, mbti, image, regdate

SELECT m.memberId, m.name, m.birthdate, m.nationality, m.position, m.mbti, m.image, m.regdate, g.groupName FROM nctmembers m LEFT JOIN nctgroups g ON m.memberId = g.memberRefId WHERE m.memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE nctmembers SET name = #{name}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, nationality = #{nationality}, position = #{position}, mbti = #{mbti}, image = #{image} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
